content:
path /v3/record
operationid getlog
parameters
description the blockchain to get the log record from
in query
name chain
required true
schema
type string
description the id of the log record or transaction to get from the blockchain
in query
name id
required true
schema
type string
minlength 1
maxlength 100
summary get a log record
description 1 credit per api call
get a log data record from the ethereum blockchain only the mainnet or the sepolia testnet
responses
200
schema
type object
required
data
data
type string
description the data stored in the requested record
description ok
tag_summary:
you can store data records on the blockchain a record is stored permanently it cannot be changed
deleted or modified by anyone and will be stored on the blockchain forever
title: 10_Blockchain storage_GetLog_128.json
